column5: that goes without saying!
this is true.  however i bet it took having a mostly canadian team in most of those years with the exception of detroit.
A NEW START FOR BUFFALO...... http://blogs.buffalonews.com/sabres/2011/02/sale-of-sabres-is-finally-official.html
Buffalo has professional sports franchise`s who knew!!!
Remember........"he who laughs last, laughs BEST"....
NO Bob.. not Billy... He who laughs last didn't understand the joke!
This has been talked about quite a bit in the last few weeks, so it's not news to hockey fans.  Not really sure how this billionaire will spend his money differently than the last?

From what all indications are (news reports) this guy LOVES his hockey and the Sabres.....he donated MILLIONS to Penn State....something like 80 million for their hockey program so he's not afraid to spend money unlike Galisono.
new owner or not, ryan miller isn't going to win a cup by himself.
What, exactly, is he going to spend?  Sabres salaries
HELP will be on it's way.........I will bet 2 dozen nightcrawlers and 4 dozen minnows that the Sabres will be hoisting the cup before the Willow Leafs....
Im trying to figure out what brought this about from a guy that dosent even watch hockey?
Because I LOVE messing with you guys......easy as pie....
We are Canadian after all,,,,,,,,,,,,
And GOOD FELLOWS.....  :thumbsup_anim:
they play hockey in the states !!! If you do, at least theres one team up here you can play with. Go habs Go !!!

EXCUSE ME sir...but the US Teams have owned the Stanley Cup for about 20 years now......maybe you guys should come down here for a lesson or two...if not Russia can teach you a thing or three.....  O BOY....those are fighting words here....  :devil:
Buffalo is that place with all the fires isn't it?  :-)
NOPE....not anymore...they all burned down....
Ya the smart Canadians go south for thier PAR money.Yer just borrowing them Bob.
Hockey is not my cup of tea.Watching guys running around trying to put that little white ball in the basket just confuses me
Good thing that Canadians don't have to play for Canadian teams, and Americans for US teams...The Cup would never leave this here Great Land!
haha i was thinking the same thing.  I can picture Mr. Bob in front of a control panel " I think I'll press THIS button" hahaha
"topping eyewitness news"

We had a lot of Italian guys where I worked and the easiest way to get them going was wait until 5 or 6 were together and ask one guy where I could get the best Italian sausage........each one had a better place...I just had to sit back and let the fun begin....  :rofl2:
I'm sorry, Buffalo's sports reputation is about as good as Toronto's when it comes to football and hockey. Blind diehard fans and lost cause teams This from a Leafs fan
